name: Quin (itch)
description:
Quin is a casual table game based on the classic card game Crazy Eights, which gave rise to games like UNO, Mau Mau and Can Can.
The objective is to be the first to discard all cards in the hand, being able to eliminate a card in your turn that is equal to the number or suit of the card that is on the table.
You can play online with up to 7 players, or against bots.
